name: Night of the Dead Fools
description:
Each year there is a night when the cemetery guard must go and look for those who died in ways most foolish so they too, can get eternal rest...

This is my second full game. In this project my aim was to practice the following:

  •  building a 3D-based map
  • adding collectible items
  • creating dynamic objects
  • adding ambinence based on different surrounding
  • creating a basic options menu
  • experimenting with lighting
  • creating my first visually pleasing visual effect
  • adding a basic narrative
